FuncDef: This command specifies the interface applicable for communications to the peer. If the interface type does not match the given context in an uplink context, the peer setup will fail.

ParaDef.Info: Signaling interface with the peer is Gn as specified in 3GPP TS 29.060.
Signaling interface with the peer is S2a as specified in 3GPP TS 29.274.
Signaling interface with the peer is S2b as specified in 3GPP TS 29.274.
Signaling interface with the peer is S11 as specified in 3GPP TS 29.274.
